headline: SmartStop Announces the Recast of its Multi-Currency Credit Facility
summary: LADERA RANCH, Calif., February 19, 2026--SmartStop Self Storage REIT, Inc. ("SmartStop") (NYSE: SMA), an internally managed real estate investment trust and a premier owner and operator of self-storage facilities in the United States and Canada, today announced that it has completed an amended and restated senior unsecured credit facility in the initial amount of $500 million with a syndicate of banks led by KeyBank National Association, Bank of Montreal, JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., M&T Bank, The

content.title: SmartStop Announces the Recast of its Multi-Currency Credit Facility
